title: The Education of the Child
features: This book was converted from its physical edition to the digital format by a community of volunteers. You may find it for free on the web. Purchase of the Kindle edition includes wireless delivery.
description: Swedish author and feminist, known as the "Pallas of Sweden." Key's work is reflective of her revolutionary social views. She beautifully uses her pen to express opinions on pacifism, feminism and humanitarianism.
